components.title: What is the total expected cost of delivering the HSRA, in pounds?

pages.title: Costs are higher than the guided price

components.name: CwEWDh
components.content:
Guided price: We expect refurbishment to cost approximately:
  • £40,000 for a property between 100 sqm and 200 sqm
  • £79,000 for a property between 201 sqm and 300 sqm

We’ll consider costs above this range but need to understand why your costs are higher.
